name: Walk Sim
description: Walk Sim is a game that takes the idea of a "walking simulator" game, and multiplys it by 100,000,000. You have to pay $1.00 (or more if you want) for early access. I'm going to update this game every once in a while, so keep your eyes peeled. Soon I'm going to make a kickstarter page for this game, and when I have I'll put a link on this page. Anyway, I hope you enjoy if you buy the game, and if you don't buy the game, then have fun playing other games. Either way, have a nice day!
